markdownRemark.html:
I often hear people who are new to programming ask what language is the best to get started with. I am a C# developer myself but I can’t say that is necessarily the best language to start with. At the same time, I wouldn’t discourage someone from learning C# first either.

I think any language in the list below would be a fair choice:

  • Javascript
  • Python
  • C#
  • Java

The biggest thing when you are getting started is making sure you choose a language that has plenty of help and documentation. The languages listed above have their strengths and weaknesses. Javascript is pretty much available everywhere. The other three are definitely available on all major platforms.

The main thing is to start learning and building!

frontmatter.title: What Is The Best First Programming Language To Learn?
